channel.title: Raised a PR for adding a new data source, but "percy/redash — 1 visual change needs review" check was not successful. Need help regarding this
channel.description:
Hi Team,
I have raised a [PR](https://github.com/getredash/redash/pull/5606) for adding a new data source Firebolt. CI was ran and I got this one error "percy/redash — 1 visual change needs review". When I checked files produced by getredash:master and rajeshSigmoid:firebolt-integration, there was no visual difference I could find. Please let me know how may I proceed further to get this resolved. [Failed case link](https://percy.io/Redash/redash/builds/13023144/changed/735907746?browser=chrome&browser_ids=20&subcategories=unreviewed%2Cchanges_requested&viewLayout=side-by-side&viewMode=new&width=1280&widths=1280)
Thank you.

item.title: Raised a PR for adding a new data source, but "percy/redash — 1 visual change needs review" check was not successful. Need help regarding this
item.dc:creator: rajeshk
item.description:
Hi Jesse,
We have been waiting for our PR to get reviewed for long time. Can you guys please review it.

Read full topic

item.title: Raised a PR for adding a new data source, but "percy/redash — 1 visual change needs review" check was not successful. Need help regarding this
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Thanks for drawing attention to this. Our percy tests are currently flaky. I have an outstanding item on my list to debug it. That’s not going to block your PR though.

Read full topic
